# Hide

## Import

```jsx
import { Hide } from 'fannypack';
```

## Usage

```jsx-live
<Hide below="desktop">
  This should hide on viewports below desktop.
</Hide>
<Hide above="desktop">
  This should hide on viewports above or equal to desktop.
</Hide>
```

## Props

### Hide Props

<Box marginBottom="major-4" />

**<Code marginRight="major-1">below</Code>** <Code fontSize="150" palette="primary">string</Code> 

<Box marginBottom="major-4" />
